pageContext.claim: “The fact is, when I took over as President, our Country was a mess. Depleted Military, Endless Wars, a potential War with North Korea, V.A., High Taxes & too many Regulations, Border, Immigration & HealthCare problems, & much more. I had no choice but to work very long hours!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump inherited a growing economy. The military was not depleted. The United States was not on the brink of war with North Korea. The V.A. reforms he signed built on previous legislation. Trump's tax cut was smaller as a share of GDP than what President Barack Obama and others signed. Southwest border apprehensions were at a 45-year low in 2017, Trump's first year in office.
